column1: Dr '''Alison Milbank''' is Associate Professor at the Department of Theology and Religious Studies at the University of Nottingham
column2: lecturing in Literature and Theology. She is also an Anglican Priest.<ref>[http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/news/expertiseguide/experts/m/dralisonmilbank
column4: Associate Professor] at [http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/ Nottingham.ac.uk] (accessed 25 December 2011)</ref><ref>[http://www.tolkienlibrary.com/press/Chesterton_and_Tolkien_as_Theologians.php Interview with Dr. Alison Milbank author of ''Chesterton and Tolkien as Theologians''] at [[Tolkien Library]] (accessed 25 December 2011)</ref>
